attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. This All-New top-of-the-range 7-seater Honda BR-V design presents a dynamic body shape with strong contour lines that accentuate the length of the vehicle. This latest BR-V model comes equipped with 5 year/200 000KM warranty and a 4-year/60 000KM service plan, along with 3 year AA Roadside assistance plan.

17” Black/Alloy Wheels • Synthetic Leather Upholstery • 2nd Row Seats Armrests • Walk-Away Auto Locking • 4.2" TFT Multi-Information Display • Body Coloured Shark Fin Antenna • Honda SENSING® Driver-Assist Technology • 6 Speaker Sound System • Auto-Headlights with Auto High-Beam • LaneWatch™ Blind Spot Camera • LED Front Fog Lights • Push-Button Start • Front Seat Armrests • Rear View Camera • Rear Parking Sensors • Smart Keyless Entry • Automatic Air Conditioning • Dual Front, Side & Curtain SRS Airbags

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor made Deal to match your pocket, trade-ins are welcome, and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.

attributes.description:
Our most loved SUV just got BREZZA! The Vitara Brezza GL S-Edition is perfect for all those customer’s who want to stand out from the crowd! Additional features include 16” Alloy Wheels, Front Bumper Garnish, Rear Bumper Garnish, Side Skid Plates, Door Visors, Front Grille “Carbon Fiber” Inserts, Interior Styling Kit in “Uber Life Silver’ and Stainless steel door sill guards. Owning a Vitara has never been Brezza. Book your test drive today to experience the all new Vitara Brezza S-Edition. LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE

This beautiful vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

Roof Rails, Electric Windows, Remote Central Locking, Daytime Running Lights, Onboard Computer, Electric Windows, Bluetooth Connectivity, Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Park Distance Control, Air Conditioning, Power Steering, Electronic Brake Distribution (EBD), Anti-lock Braking System (ABS), Radio / CD, Rear View Camera, Air Bag

attributes.description:
The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 2 year / 30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This new spec Suzuki Swift is now packed with ESP(Electronic Stability Program) assisting you in those hectic bends. Other notable feature include 14" Genuine A-Line Rims, rear PDCs and a blacked out roof

Book your test drive today! 

FINANCE AVAILABLE TO ALL APPROVED BUYERS.
TRADE INS WELCOME.
DELIVERY NATIONWIDE.
